General.Description: With the foudation of Ethereum, aelf (ELF) was developed as a multi-chain computing network. Moreovee, ELF also use ERC20 token, which help token holders to vote on decisions related to the project's development and governance.
General.Features: ELF provides the high performance for any users, because it brings about full nodes run on cloud servers. Moreover, each smart contract will be run on own blockchain such a resource segregation. Last but not least, the token holders can vote for decision making and respresentatives.
General.Technology: Based on the Ethereum token, ELF was serves as a currency on aelf's ecosystem. Furthermore, the platform is based ERC20 token that brings the users a multi-chain network.
